_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Ascetics and brahmins who don’t truly un: They don’t realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin
They don’t live having realized it with their own insight
Ascetics and brahmins who do truly under: They realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin
They live having realized it with their own insight
Those who don’t understand suffering and: They don’t know the path that leads to the stilling of suffering
They lack the release by wisdom
Unable to make an end, they continue to be reborn and grow old
Those who understand suffering and suffe: They understand the path that leads to the stilling of suffering
They’re endowed with the heart’s release
They’re endowed with the release by wisdom
Able to make an end, they don’t continue to be reborn and grow old
